description: Split text based on natural language boundaries, optimized for a specified language.

inputs.name: chunk_size
inputs.info: The maximum number of characters in each chunk after splitting.

inputs.name: chunk_overlap
inputs.info: The number of characters that overlap between consecutive chunks.

inputs.name: data_input
inputs.info: The text data to be split.

inputs.name: separator
inputs.info:
The character(s) to use as a delimiter when splitting text.
Defaults to "\n\n" if left empty.

inputs.name: language
inputs.info: The language of the text. Default is "English". Supports multiple languages for better text boundary recognition.
